pie-chart-salty-sweet.png.description: A pie chart of the distribution of a class' snack flavors showing a large green wedge representing 71.3% sweet, a small yellow wedge for the 19.1% salty and smaller blue and red wedges for the snacks that were 'both' salty and sweet or 'neither'
